abstract:
\begin{abstract}
We point out the existence of a class of non-Gaussian yet 
free ``quantum field theories'' in 0+0 dimensions, based on a cubic
action classified by simple Lie groups. A ``three-pronged'' version
of the Wick theorem applies. \hfill (LPTHE-P03-01, {\tt hep-th/0302043})
\
